publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3510 Nicola Sturgeon: The Draft Community Care and Health (Scotland) Act 2002 (Amendment to Schedule 1) Order 2009—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Community Care and Health (Scotland) Act 2002 (Amendment to schedule 1) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison*

S3M-3510 Nicola Sturgeon: The Draft Community Care and Health (Scotland) Act 2002 (Amendment to Schedule 1) Order 2009—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Community Care and Health (Scotland) Act 2002 (Amendment to schedule 1) Order 2009 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison
